info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 2 weeks ago,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Mamun is a great host and his place is also very comfortable. I highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a cozy place at reasonable price. If I again need to stay at Dhaka, I would book Mamun’s place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 2 weeks ago,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: we were staying second time. enjoyed our stay. caretaker Mr Alam was always helpful

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 2 weeks ago,  · Stayed a few nights
Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: I had originally booked for 2 days but ended up extending my stay for another 10 days. The apartment is spotless and has all the amenities. Mr. Mamun was very responsive and both him and the housekeeper were extremely hospitable. If there is an opportunity in the future, I'll book this apartment again during my next visit to Bangladesh.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It's a very comfortable apartment to stay in and Mr. Mamun has been very responsive throughout. The apartment has working washing machine, AC, kitchen and smart TV. It has everything you need. the location is a bit inconvenient but it's easy enough to find transport. I have extended my stay for 5 more days at this place since we like it so much.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Mr. Mamun is very responsive and co operative. This accommodation was great like picture. House caretaker also very friendly. Only house location is complicated for me I didn’t find it easily. Otherwise everything is alright. Hopefully I will visit next time.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
As always, an excellent host.
I have stayed in his place a few times. It has been a pleasure.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights

rating_comment:
The apartment is indeed cosy and beautiful, the home appliances helped me a lot. Alam the caretaker is down to earth and polite. Readily available rickshaws to come to main road.
I really felt like being in my own space, I hope it stays maintained like the same, I would surely like to visit the apartment again.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This AirBnB was great. I loved that it was in more a local neighborhood, Dhanmondi. This also made it more difficult to travel around with the Dhaka traffic. Overall, the place was great though and I would definitely recommend it to others.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Great place to stay, I reserved this place for my friends, it is my 2nd reservations here, my friends stayed for several nights. They loved it, safe and secure.
Thank you so much to host Mr. Mamun for keeping this place clean!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This is a very practical and elegantly furnished apartment with all amenities you can think of. It is located in a bustling area and feels very homely. Would definitely visit again. Thank you so much to the hosts!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed with kids
Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Mr Mamun is undoubtedly a wonderful host. It was a peaceful stay 😊
Highly recommended ☑️

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great host. Very clear and straightforward. The amenities are great and the price is reasonable. Will love to stay again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Mr. Mamun’s place is very nice, neat and clean, excellent service, he is very good communicator, even though we didn’t meet in person but he promptly responded to all my messages and inquires, we enjoyed staying his place, it is like a home out of home. We will certainly stay his place again. I highly recommend this place for others.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Mamun has been an amazing amazing host. We had little kids with us and he has been very understanding, helped us with flexible check-in and out. Very responsive. The people employed been very sincere and friendly like Mamun. We've been to few other Airbnbs in Bangladesh but we loved his place the most. Great wifi speed, AC although we didn't use it much coz his place was very cool even in the extreme heat. Will definitely visit his place again and nowhere else. I would definitely recommend his place anyone visiting Bangladesh. Close to all the malls and restaurants. Thank you Mamun for a being an amazing host to my family.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Good service, Bed rooms are reasonably specious. Mr. Mamun is gentleman of integrity.I will come back again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I found Mr Mamun as a wonderful, well mannered, responsible host. Initially I booked for 5 days then I extended my staying another two days without any hassle. I would highly recommend Mr Mamun property to Airbnb customers & of course I will rebook this property When I visit Bangladesh again.
Thank you for your kind cooperation all the support Mr. Mamun.😊😊😊😊
